books.title: Betwixt
books.publisher: Published by Quill & Flame Publishing House
books.logline: Returning to her birthplace of Ketchikan, Alaska after her mother's sudden death, a socially anxious teen must discover the truth of her newfound magic abilities and her mother's veiled past before the powers governing the forest destroy her.

image.description: Betwixt book image by Kimberly Dunham

shortStories.title: Blackthorn and Holly
shortStories.detail: Featured in the Seasons of Romantasy anthology
shortStories.publisher: Published by Quill & Flame Publishing House
shortStories.logline: Abandoned by her people and her magic, a determined farm girl struggles to prepare her farm for winter, care for her beloved chickens, and protect her ancestral land from magic-hunting invaders with the aid of a mysterious traveler before she loses her home.

image.description: Seasons of Romantasy book image featuring Blackthorn and Holly by Kimberly Dunham
